> -----Original Message-----
> From: "Aron Roberts" <aron@...>
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Fri, 13 Sep 2002 19:29:40 -0000
> Subject: swingui.TestRunner anomaly under Mac OS X?
> 
>   When running a simple TestCase using 
> junit.swingui.TestRunner under Mac OS X 10.1.5, the progress 
> bar is displayed in the default Aqua color, and never changes to 
> either green or red:
> 
>   http://seaotter.berkeley.edu/junit/
> 
>   This first occurred with JUnit 3.8 and continues with 3.8.1.  
> JUnit 3.7 did not exhibit this behavior.
> 
>   Further details cheerfully provided upon request ...

Aron,

Could I talk you into opening a new bug at:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=15278&atid=115278

Thanks,
Erik Meade
http://junit.org
